email_subject: Save an extra $50 on the iPaq 3835 PDA (CNET SHOPPER)
email_body: The body of the email is in HTML format and contains promotional content from CNET Shopper Newsletter Alerts, including offers from Computers4Sure and Dell, as well as links to various products and advertisements. Due to the complexity and length of the HTML content, it is not practical to include the entire body text here.
